metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4163 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
GNTTABOP_swap_grant_ref in Xen 4.2 through 4.5 does not check the grant table operation version, which allows local guest domains to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a hypercall without a GNTTABOP_setup_table or GNTTABOP_set_version.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4163` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxen-4.4 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
libxen-ocaml - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
libxenstore3.0 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.1-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.3-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.3-armhf - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.4-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.4-arm64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-hypervisor-4.4-armhf - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-system-amd64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
xen-system-arm64 - 4.4.2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
